description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源(如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源(如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等)及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。
description.en: 1.History and paradigm of programming languages 2.Design principles of programming languages 3.Syntex and semantics 4.Data types 5.Control structures 6. Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度的計算機圖學，介紹三維計算機繪圖原理、OpenGL、著色語言、繪圖管線、計算幾何、射線追蹤、體積成像繪圖，課程範圍包含計算機圖學最新的研究主題如物理模擬、射線投射、巨觀且聚焦技術、即時體積成像繪圖等等。
description.en: This course is a graduate-level computer graphics class. Topics include 3D computer graphics, OpenGL, shading language, graphics pipeline, computational geometry, ray tracing, and volume rendering. The course material cover topics of the state-of-the-art research problems, such as the physical simulation, ray casting, focus and context techniques for volume data for real-time rendering.

description.zh: 學習敏捷與精實軟體開發方法與敏捷實務作法。本課程將涵蓋下列主題：一、Scrum方法二、終極編程方法三、看板方法四、終極編程核心與配套實務作法五、精實軟體開發實務做法
description.en: Students will learn Agile and Lean software development methods and agile practices. This course will cover the following topics:一、Scrum method二、XP method三、Kanban method四、XP primary and corollary practices五、Lean software development practices

Topics include 3D computer graphics, OpenGL, shading language, graphics pipeline, computational geometry, ray tracing, and volume rendering. The course material cover topics of the state-of-the-art research problems, such as the physical simulation, ray casting, focus and context techniques for volume data for real-time rendering.

description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 陳文輝老師/王柏雅老師合開

description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 介紹VBA 語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of EXCEL VBA language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
description.en: Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.

notes: 化工系教師，四選一項目

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 一、應力及應變分析。 二、線彈性破壞理論。 三、黏彈性破壞理論。 四、岩石動態行為。 五、岩石材料性質。六、岩體特性。七、大地應力應變現地量測。八、岩石模型。九、岩石爆破與開挖。十、地下工程設計及施工。十一、監測系統。
description.en: 一、Stress and strain analysis二、Linear elastical failure theory三、Visco-elastic failure theory四、Dynamics behavior of rocks五、Rock properties六、Rock behavior七、In-situ stress and strain measurement八、Rock model九、Rock blasting and excavation十、Underground engineering operation十一、Monitoring system

description.zh: 本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical  compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal  structures.  Application examples are introduced in the  fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical  industry, etc..

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 近年來網頁技術的快速發展，網頁設計也從傳統的後台PHP進展到以HTML5+CSS3+Javascript技術為主的前端工程。此外，UI／UX的協同設計也是建立一個好的網頁的重要部分。 本課程旨在教導學生使用HTML5+CSS3+Javascript技術進行現代化的網頁設計，課程內容以靜態網頁的版面設計為主，包含RWD的響應式跨平台網頁設計。其中也涵蓋了UI／UX的概念建立。期待同學能經由這門課建立前端工程需要的基本技能。
description.en: In recent years, the rapid development of web technology, web design has also progressed from the traditional platform- PHP to HTML5+ CSS3 + Java script technology-based, front-end engineering. In addition, the collaborative design of the UI/UX is an important part of building a good Web page. This course is designed to teach students to modernize web design using HTML5-CSS3-Javascript technology, with a focus on static web layout and responsive cross-platform web design with RWD. It also covers the concept building of UI/UX. Expect students to establish the basic skills needed for front-end engineering through this course.

notes: 視傳組&第2專長(B)選修,上限50人

description.zh: 由於網路的發展迅速，電子商務已經是必然的趨勢。本課程中介紹經營電子商務所需的各種重點技巧，包括產品規劃，通路規劃，商業網站設計、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學對經營電子商務有一個整體的了解。
description.en: This course will teach how to management the e-commerce.

notes: 工管四甲乙和工管所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹資料分析與圖示的工具與方法，包括如何以精確的模式來描述資料、利用各種指標與圖形來探索給定資料的特性、特徵、或是規律性，並且可以根據所建立的資料模型來進行估計與預測。此外，我們也將探討如何產生各種機率分布的隨機樣本，以及各種最佳化問題求解。本課程將以R程式語言為工具。
description.en: This course introduces tools and methods for data analysis and graphics. The main topics include models that are used to describe data, indices and plots for exploring data characteristics and patterns, and estimation and prediction based on the data models. In addition, we discuss how to generate random sample from probability distributions and how to solve optimization problems. The selected tool for this course is R.

description.zh: 本課程希望協助學生瞭解如何以標準積體電路系統設計流程來設計超大型積體電路系統，旨在採用多種數位與類比電腦輔助設計軟體來訓練學生，使其能熟悉並使用超大型積體電路系統的設計軟體，培育學生具備超大型積體電路系統設計實務與經驗。本課程的主要內容包括：1.超大型積體電路簡介；2.晶片製程介紹；3.MOSFET元件；4. MOSFET走線；5.Hspice軟體介紹 ；6. Hspice電路模擬；7.類比電路佈局與實作；8.Verilog HDL(硬體描述語言)；9.電路合成 ；10.自動測試圖樣產生；11.時脈靜態分析；12.電路佈局與佈線；13.DRC與LVS檢測；14.寄生參數萃取與佈局後模擬；15.設計功能驗證16. 設計方案報告
description.en: Students will learn how to design VLSI circuits and systems based on a standard VLSI system design flow, where various electronic design automation (EDA) tools will be used extensively in the semester. Those EDA tools includes analog and digital circuits and systems. The main purpose of this course includes the following:1.	VLSI Introduction.2.	Manufacturing Process.3.	MOSFET Devices.4.	MOSFET Wires.5.	Hspice Software.6.	Hspice Simulation.7.	Analog IC Layout and Practice.8.	Verilog-HDL.9.	Synthesis.10.	Design for Testability and Automatic Test Pattern Generation.11.	Static Timing Analysis.12.	Placement and Routing.13.	Design Rule Check, Layout Versus Schematic.14.	Layout Parasitic Extraction and Simulation.15.	Design Verification.16.	Project Presentation.

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路系統設計實務
name.en: Computer-Aided VLSI System Design and Practice

description.zh: 深度學習數位影像分析，在近代的製造、醫藥、農業、太空探索、運輸和通信系統等應用領域，正迅速發展中。本課程主要介紹深度學習數位影像分析基本理論基礎，以此概念實際應用到各領域中。課程將探索最先進的深度學習模型，如物件偵測、影像分類，和影像分割，提供實用的實務練習；最後討論數位影像分析深度學習的未來挑戰。課程也將介紹最新的公開影像數據集(例如MNIST，CIFAR-10和ImageNet)，並涵蓋用於深度學習中的影像數據前處理和樣本標籤註記，詳細探討深度學習模型的評估指標。本課程將使用Matlab和Python範例，實作教學練習，課程單元包含:●數位影像分析簡介●深度學習基礎●影像分析領域之深度學習基本介紹●卷積神經網絡●訓練卷積神經網絡●遷移式學習●深度學習數位影像數據標籤註記●深度學習模型評估方式●深度學習在數位影像分析領域之挑戰●超引數優化●激活函式●損失函式●優化函式
description.en: The field of digital image analysis is growing rapidly in many application areas such as manufacturing, medicine, agriculture, transportation, and communication systems. This course aims to introduce the foundations of deep learning for digital image analysis from the fundamental theoretical concepts to applications. The class will provide students with an opportunity to explore the state-of-the-art deep learning models for object detection, image classification, and image segmentation with practical hands-on experience. The challenges of deep learning in the field of digital image analysis will be discussed in this class. The course will also explore some popular image datasets such as MNIST, CIFAR-10, and ImageNet, covering the image data preparation and labeling for deep learning. Evaluation metrics for deep learning models will be examined in detail. Students are free to use any programming language, however the programming examples in this course will be given in Matlab and Python

name.zh: 深度學習數位影像分析
name.en: Deep Learning for Digital Image Analysis

description.zh: 1. 介紹計算機網絡和Internet， 通信協議體結構， 分封交換2. 應用層協議：HTTP，FTP，SMTP，DNS，P2P， 套接編程和Web服務器實現。3. 傳輸層協議：TCP，UDP4. 網路層協議：IP5. 數據鏈接層協議:Ethernet, LAN6. 無線和移動網絡
description.en: 1. Introduction to computer networks and the Internet. Protocolarchitectures (TCP/IP, OSI). Packet switching 2. Application Layer Protocols: HTTP, FTP, SMTP, DNS, P2P. Socket programming and Web server implementations. 3. Transport Layer Protocols: TCP, UDP 4. Network Layer Protocols: IP 5. Data Link Layer Protocols: Ethernet. Local area networks 6. Wireless and Mobile Network

description.zh: 1. 介紹計算機網絡和Internet， 通信協議體結構， 分封交換2. 應用層協議：HTTP，FTP，SMTP，DNS，P2P， 套接編程和Web服務器實現。3. 傳輸層協議：TCP，UDP4. 網路層協議：IP5. 數據鏈接層協議:Ethernet, LAN6. 無線和移動網絡
description.en: 1. Introduction to computer networks and the Internet. Protocolarchitectures (TCP/IP, OSI). Packet switching 2. Application Layer Protocols: HTTP, FTP, SMTP, DNS, P2P. Socket programming and Web server implementations. 3. Transport Layer Protocols: TCP, UDP 4. Network Layer Protocols: IP 5. Data Link Layer Protocols: Ethernet. Local area networks 6. Wireless and Mobile Network

description.zh: 本課程為整合型課程，以多主題方式介紹當代與下世代先進材料化學技術，包含先進奈米合成技術、奈米微影科技、功能性催化材料化學、生醫材料化學、功能性高分子設計以及軟性元件製作等。本課程為跨系院課程，由多位教師共同授課，提供跨領域知識學習與培養學生跨領域思考。
description.en: This course is an integrated course that introduces emerging and next-generation advanced materials chemistry in a multi-topic approach, including advanced nanomaterials synthesis, nanolithography technology, catalytic materials chemistry, biomaterials chemistry, functional polymer design, and the production of soft electronic devices. It is an interdepartmental course, lectured by multiple teachers, and providing multidisciplinary knowledge learning.

name.en: Special Topics on Advanced Materials Chemistry

description.zh: 課程主要內容介紹自動化科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，並側重在自動化科技相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of automatic and advanced technologies. The topics covered mainly in the areas of automation technologies, and related research areas.

notes: 自動化所和機電博合開

description.zh: 本課程透過案例研究與設計實作，幫助學生學習工業設計師應該具備的物聯網基本概念，以及基於設計思考的物聯網產品設計原理與方法。
description.en: By case studies and design projects, this course is to help students learn the basic concepts of Internet of Things (IoT), and the principles and methods of IoT product design based with design thinking.

name.zh: 工業設計與物聯網專題
name.en: Special topics in Industrial Design for the Internet of Things

notes: 工設三四與日碩合開；大學部上限15人

description.zh: 本課程藉由實地場域踏場及在地對話，導入設計思考與實踐能量，學習如何協助地方擴展並升級形象。課程中可藉由形象設計等手法了解如何提升城市文化的在地體驗，深化地方共同體的歸屬感。修課學生可實際體驗形象塑造之程序及手法，包含參與線上線下設計工作坊、試打樣與製作之程序，可串接未來展示與社造等設計研究相關活動。
description.en: This course introduces design thinking and practical energy through field visits and in-situ dialogues and learns how to help expand and upgrade the image of a place. In this course, I will teach image design and other design methods to understand how to enhance urban culture's in-place experience and deepen the local community's sense of belonging. Students can experience image-building procedures and techniques, including participating in online and offline design workshops, trial proofing and production procedures, and connecting with future exhibition and social design research-related activities.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

notes: 全英授課；電腦教室；Ardila Hayu Tiwikrama

description.zh: 地質工程為一新興科學，原來為解決全球變遷等大尺度問題而提出。基本上可以土木及環境工程兩大方面。本課程將從地質背景出發，結合工程問題及其處理對策，提供學生一個整合性的思考及基礎的地質知能。
description.en: Geoengineering is planetary-scale environmental engineering, particularly engineering aimed at counteracting the undesired side effects of other human activities. Geoengineering covers a wide range of engineering disciplines related to geo-materials, such as foundation engineering, slope engineering, tunnelling, rock engineering, engineering geology and geo-environmental engineering. This course interests range from geological to geomorphological concept, to provide a firm fundamental background for the civil engineering and environmental engineering, and to manage and mitigate of natural hazards. Implicit in these pursuits is the stewardship of the earth, and the quest to harvest the most advanced fruits of scientific achievements as tools for our graduates to work with.

notes: 土木二甲乙合開 /上限40人

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 本課程介紹程式設計的觀念與方法，內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念。有關物件導向程式設計與系統分析之概念亦將於程式語法純熟後予以介紹。
description.en: This course investigates the principles, languages and environments, and elementary design methods for programming design. The content focuses on logic design and training programming capability. Some concepts such as program structure, debugging, portability and software engineering are considered as well. Some topics about object-oriented programming language and system analysis are also addressed after students familiar with the programming language.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學期中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

notes: 土木三甲乙合開/上限40人

description.zh: 本課程以講授營建工程之污染公害為主,使學生經由該課目的學習以了解其防治方法與原理,此課程內容包括:1.諸論                 2.營建施工的種類及其污染形式3.營建管理的相關法規   4.噪音防治5.逸散性粒狀物防治     6.廢土及廢棄物污染防治7.施工作業的環境測定   8.施工現場的環境管理與環境評核.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course,Prevention of Public Disaster for Activities,focuses on pollution cintrol in construction area.Contents of the course include:Sources and classification of pollution.Management regulations . Fugitive dust,Soil waste,Measurement of pollutants and Safety management.

notes: 土木三甲乙合開/上限40人

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含: 生醫產業簡介, 新世紀人類基因體大計畫, 微生物工程新應用, 新型蛋白質藥劑之開發, 分子醫療診斷之革新, 生醫產業之電腦新科技, 遠距醫療服務新模式, 創新健康管理與保險制度的創新, 生醫產業與科技法律, 生醫產業與社會倫理, 幹細胞新產業, 組織再生新產業, 超級老鼠的誕生, 美美的生醫美容, 抗癌症研究之新科技, 抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含: 生醫產業簡介, 新世紀人類基因體大計畫, 微生物工程新應用, 新型蛋白質藥劑之開發, 分子醫療診斷之革新, 生醫產業之電腦新科技, 遠距醫療服務新模式, 創新健康管理與保險制度的創新, 生醫產業與科技法律, 生醫產業與社會倫理, 幹細胞新產業, 組織再生新產業, 超級老鼠的誕生, 美美的生醫美容, 抗癌症研究之新科技, 抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of biomedical industries in the new millennium. The course covers areas such as human genome project, biotechnology application with microbes, new protein drug, innovative medical technology, computation biology in biomedical industries, new business models in telemedicine, health care management and innovative insurance trends, technology laws in biomedical industries, social responsibility and biomedical industries, stem cell technology, new industries from tissue engineering and so on.  The grading method of the course is based on the oral and written reports.

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 介紹工程契約之內容與種類，以及其實際的作業程序及相關的投標規定；此外並說明規範的製定內涵與意義，同時探討其對工程之影響與重要性。

notes: 土木四甲乙合開/上限40人(待聘蘇南老師)

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

notes: 土木四甲乙合開/上限40人

description.zh: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the theory and application of groundwater flow modeling, focusing on MODFLOW. The topic is including numerical methods, discreteness and boundaries, parameterization and calibration, problems and case-histories.

notes: 土木四甲乙合開/上限40人

description.zh: 本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的選修課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由課堂講授與實際場域參訪的方式，使修課學生能夠瞭解鐵道號誌系統的內涵。號誌系統是列車運行的控制系統。其功用必需兼顧整個鐵道運輸系統的「安全」、「迅速」、與「經濟」。由於號誌系統本身屬於跨管理、通訊與控制等專業領域的技術，因此，本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式、針對選讀學程之學生、邀請鐵道號誌系統專家、以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時，針對管理、通訊與自動控制等三部分提出號誌系統規劃與評估報告，並邀請鐵道號誌系統專家擔任評審。
description.en: This course is one of the optional courses for the Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The goal of this course is, via both in-class lecturing and field-trip visiting, to have participant students realize the contents of Railway Signal System. The signal system is the control system of train operation. To give consideration to safety, rapidness and economy of entire railway transportation system, this system will be required. Since the signal system is the technology including management, communication and automatic control, this course is a joint-lecture among departments inside our college with synchronized class hours. The industrial instructors for the participant students include experts on railway signal system from relevant fields in intelligent rail industry. In the student reports, they will demonstrate the railway signal system planning and evaluation report for the management, communication and automatic control.

name.zh: 鐵道號誌與行車控制系統
name.en: Railway Signal and Traffic Control System

notes: 機械三四合開/第三演講廳

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。基本概念、生產預測、產品/服務設計、生產製程與產能規劃、設施佈置、工作系統設計、生產計劃、生產管制、存貨管理、全面品質管理、設備預防保養。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Production Forecasting Product/Service Design, Production Processes and Capacity planning, Facility Layout, Job system Design, Production planning, Production Control, Inventory Control, Total Quality Management, Preventive Maintenance.

notes: 機械三四合開/第三演講廳

description.zh: 先修課程：數位電路與微處理器工業自動化基本控制元件的設計觀念、使用方法與應用規劃；內容包含人機介面裝置(Human Machine Interface, HMI)、可程式邏輯控制器(Programmable Logic Controller, PLC)、交流伺服馬達(AC Servo Motor)的原理解說與應用設計實作課程。
description.en: Pre-requisites：Digital Circuit, MicroprocessorThe fundamental design concepts、operations and application development of industrial automation controllers are focused. Architectures and applications design of Human Machine Interface(HMI), Programmable Logic Controller(PLC) and AC Servo Motor are introduced. Hands-on work and exercises are included.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

notes: *機械三合開/校-電腦教室/限40人

description.zh: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
description.en: Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en: Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

description.zh: 本課程以機械製造結合工業4.0技術為主，包括近代製造技術概論、E化製造、物聯網基本介紹、巨量資料於製程優化的應用、智慧型演算之原理與應用、機器視覺檢測應用、彈性製造系統、網宇實體系統、智能化工廠應用實例、應用APP撰寫等，增進學生對現代製造技術內容之理解、內化、與判斷應用能力，並加強工業4.0相關最新科技之介紹與應用，以期培養對應用聯網技術、大數據、雲端運算、及人工智慧於製造相關課題有技術與能力之工程師。
description.en: This course is based on integration of mechanical manufacturing and industry 4.0, which is made of the modern manufacturing, the computational manufacturing,the internet of things, the optimization of manufacturing using big data, the intelligent calculation, machine vision measurement, flexible manufacturing, CPS system, smart factory, APP, etc.. This course can improve student’s knowledge of modern manufacturing, judgment, and industry 4.0, which will further create engineers with networking technology, big data, cloud calculation, and artificial intelligence in manufacturing.

notes: 機械三合開/電腦教室(校)/限40人

description.zh: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始與邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: 1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the numerical method 2. Numerical methods of solving nonlinear algebraic equations. 3. Numerical methods of solving systems of linear equations. 4. Numerical interpolation and extrapolation. 5. Numerical differentiation and integration.6. Numerical methods of ordinary differential equations with initial-value problems and boundary value problems.

notes: 機械三合開/全英語/限40人

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

notes: 限30人機電所和製科所合開，製科所必選課程之一

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

notes: 限21人/機電所和製科所合開

description.zh: 定性之隨機系統、定性及隨機系統參數估計、定性及隨機系統之適應預測、線性定性及隨機系統之適應控制。
description.en: Deterministic and Stochastic system, Parameter Estimation of Deterministic and Stochastic systems, Adaptive Estimation of Deterministic and Stochastic systems, Adaptive Controls of Linear Deterministic and Stochastic Systems.

notes: 全英語/限50人/機電所、製科所、機電博合開

description.zh: 1. 台灣海域的地質概述, 2. 海域的工程地質調查, 3. 不同環境下的風場結構, 4. 海流特性的調查與評估, 5. 波浪特性的調查與評估, 6. 鋼結構施工, 7. 風機之運輸與安裝, 8. 灌漿工程, 9. 離岸變電站與基礎, 10. 風機葉片之製作、安裝、維護與維修11. 海纜鋪設工程 12. 構材防蝕技術 13. 沖刷防治 14 基樁鑽掘與噪音降檢
description.en: 1. Offshore geology description nearby Taiwan, 2. Offshore geotechnical site investigation, 3. Wind farm structures under different environmental conditions, 4. Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

notes: 防災所和工程學院(大)合開(限大學生選修20人)

description.zh: 1. 混凝土結構概述與支撐結構混凝土材料特性, 2. 支撐結構設計載重與材料強度規定, 3. 離岸風機地震載重設計, 4. 離岸風機風載重設計, 5. 離岸風機波浪載重設計, 6. 支撐結構之疲勞設計, 7. 支撐結構之鋼結構設計與案例, 8. 支撐結構之混凝土結構設計與案例, 9. 離岸風機基礎設計
description.en: 1. Concepts of concrete structures and concrete material properties, 2. Loads and material strength required for designing supporting structures, 3. Seismic design of offshore wind turbines, 4. Wind resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 5. Wave resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 6. Fatigue design of supporting structures, 7. Case studies of steel structure design for supporting structures, 8. Case studies of concrete structure design for supporting structures, 9. Footing design of offshore wind turbines

name.zh: 離岸風機支撐結構分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and design of supporting structures for offshore wind turbines

notes: 防災所和工程學院(大)合開(限大學生選修20人)

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database（DB） is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

notes: 土木四甲乙&防災所合開(大學部18人;研究所9人)

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en: The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開；合開總上限15人；USR

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。

The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開；合開總上限15人；USR

description.zh: (A) 部分：1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，(B) 部分：1.認識Cadence系統， 2.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3.零件庫介紹，4.設計電路之輸入編輯，5.電路模擬實習，6.數位電路的晶片設計，7.晶片製造專題。

notes: 電子大四甲乙合開；總人數上限50人；綜科502

description.zh: 1.展頻和錯誤控制碼簡介2.頻率再使用和細胞概念3.無線電傳播環境4.同通道干擾5.涵蓋6.頻譜效率和容量7.通道模型8.分集9.二代細胞式行動通訊標準
description.en: 1.Introduction to spread spectrum communications and error control codes 2.Frequency reuse and cellular concepts 3.Mobile radio propagation environment 4.Co-channel interference 5.Coverage 6.Spectral efficiency and capacity 7.Propagation modeling 8.Diversity 9.2G cellular standards

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 電子大四甲乙與電子所合開；綜科501

description.zh: 本課程為「電磁波」課程之延伸，以電磁波輻射特性之探討為主,可作為研究所「電波傳播」、「無線通訊系統」與「智慧型天線」等課程基礎。預修科目: 電磁波、電波工程導論中文概述1.行動通訊系統中之天線基本觀念2.天線重要基本參數3.電磁波輻射特性4.線型天線5.微帶天線6.天線陣列設計7.天線量測
description.en: 1.General view of Antenna in Mobile System2.Fundamental Parameters of Antenna3.Radiation Characteristics of Electromagnetic Wave4.Linear Wire Antenna5.Microstrip Antenna6.Antenna Array Design7.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in cyber-physical system design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction, 2. Embedded Development Tools and Environment, 3.Wireless Sensor (Multi-hop) Communication, 4. Discrete System and Sensor Modeling, 5. Distributed Computation Modeling.

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹實用型單晶片微處理機的基本原理，學習微處理器的整體架構，進而編寫程式控制晶片硬體及週邊應用模組電路，令學習者能利用小型微處理器達到自動控制系統應用之能力。課程內容包括：1.單晶片微處理機架構簡介2.基本控制指令介紹3.實習板及開發環境使用4.LED閃爍控制及LED 矩陣輸出實習5.發聲控制實習6.超音波模組控制實習7.LCD顯示控制實習8.紅外線控制應用實習9.RFID控制應用實習10.期末專題實習
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce fundamental theories behind single-chip microcontroller. We will also teach the structure of microcontroller and how to use basic instructions to control the hardware and I/O module circuits. The lab content includes:1.Introduction to single-chip microcontroller2.Introduction to basic instructions3.Experiment board and IDE4.LED flash control and LED matrix practice5.Speaker control practice6.Ultrasonic sensor module practice7.LCD display practice8.Infrared sensor module practice9.RFID module practice10.Final Project practice

Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

description.zh: 平行運算指的是將需要耗費大量電腦CPU時間的複雜工程模擬問題平行化，分散到不同處理器上同時同步執行，以求能在合理的時間內獲致結果，並應用在工程設計或理論建構上。在本課程中將介紹平行運算的原理（Concurrency and Synchronization），分辨可平行化和不可平行化的問題，探討平行運算的演算法和可計算性，以及介紹將程式平行化的實用技術，並分析程式容錯性和可靠度（Fault Tolerance and Reliability），以幫助學生將平行運算應用在土木工程和學術研究中，學生將有機會使用平行化程式語言（High Performance Fortran）開發應用程式，本課程先修課程為程式設計，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Parallel computing is a methodology to handle complex engineering problems by distributing the intensive computation work to different processors to process simultaneously in order to obtain the results in a reasonable amount of time. This course will introduce the basic theory of parallel computing, teach how to identify problems that are parallelizable, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of parallel computing to civil engineering problems. Students will have opportunities to obtain hands-on experience by developing their own parallel programs (using High Performance Fortran). The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類資料探勘技術與理論的基礎觀念及架構，以奠定學生日後從事資料探勘分析與研究工作時之需。相關的分析技術將包括應用在分類(classification)、推估(estimation)、預測(prediction)、關聯式分組(affinity grouping)、同質分組(clustering)等功能中的決策樹、(decision tree)多變量分析(multivariate analysis)及類神經網路(neural network)等方法。此外為了讓學生對相關技術有更深的瞭解，課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解在商業智慧分析上資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: Several fundamental theories of data mining techniques are included in this course. For examples, decision tree, multivariate analysis and neural network. All these techniques will be applied in different areas, such as classification, association rule, forecasting, and pattern recognition. And various applications in different enterprises are also included.

description.zh: 數位時代的快速變遷使得許多高階管理者們對於企業應該如何轉型感到不確定。了解科技、商業模式、消費者行為等趨勢，才能使企業從數位環境中發現機會，定位未來企業的發展方向並尋求合適的方法進行變革，成功進行數位化轉型，將挑戰轉化為商機。本課程將針對企業數位轉型中相關議題如環境發展，數位策略，數位經營模式，製造業與服務業等各產業數位案例，及企業數位化成熟度等作研析。
description.en: The rapid changes in the digital age have made many high-level managers uncertain about how companies should transform. Understanding trends in technology, business models, consumer behavior, etc., enables companies to identify opportunities in the digital environment, position the future direction of the enterprise and seek appropriate ways to transform, successfully transform digitally, and turn challenges into business opportunities.This course will focus on the related issues such as environmental development, digital strategy, digital business model, manufacturing and service industries, and the digital maturity of enterprises.

description.zh: 認識高頻電子電路動作原理並建立高頻電子電路設計能力，1.傳輸線原理，2.高頻元件，3.散射參數，4.史密斯圖應用，5.小信號放大器，6.低雜訊放大器，7.射頻放大器，8.振盪器，9.混波與檢波，10.功率分／合器。
description.en: 1.Transmission lineas2.High frequency component3.Scattering parameter4.Smith chart application 5.Small signal amplifier6.Low nosie amplifier7.RF amplifier8.Oscillator9.Mixers and detectors10.Power combiner/spitter

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 人工智慧導論與應用，依序介紹機器學習、深度學習等人工智慧發展範疇與技術演進，並就問題思考精神、人類腦神經運作方式與數學達成之手段與技巧 ，作完整展開之介紹與討論 ，並依技術應用之發展、需求導引之趨勢、AI能力之未來發展方向與應用展望，加以說明與討論。
description.en: Introduce machine learning, deep learning and other artificial intelligence development categories and technological evolution in order, and give a complete introduction and discussion on the spirit of thinking about problems, the operation method of human brain and the methods and techniques of mathematical achievement.   Following the progress of technology and application, the trend of driven demand, the future development direction on AI ability and the prospective application will be explained and discussed in depth.

name.en: Introduction and Application of Artificial Intelligence

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 炸藥與爆破工程應用於岩石爆破，為採礦及大地工程的基本作業。本課程之目的在介紹炸藥性質、炸藥反應原理、爆材特性及應用、爆破設計及施工並兼及爆破作業之環境控制。
description.en: The blasting engineering course focuses on the introduction of explosives and their properties and characteristics, explosives and blasting theories, drilling and blasting design and operations, and environemtnal control of blasting.

notes: 材資三、四乙合開/全英文授課

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭                                         解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義2.廢棄物分類                                         收集與清運3.焚化處理4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置6.特殊處理方法7.廢棄物處理                                         廠之規劃.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and                                         Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the                                         course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and                                         transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹軟性計算的概念、特性與優點，旨在提供學生多種不同的技術解決相關問題。課程目標有二：(1) 相關軟性計算技術，包含：關聯分析、群聚分析、分類等；(2)相關軟性計算技術應用，包含：時間序列分析、M-V Model、商業資料分析與組合管理等。
description.en: In this course, concepts, properties advantages of soft computing are introduced for providing various ways for students to solve problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related soft computing techniques, including association analysis, clustering, classification, etc; (2) related soft computing applications, including time series analysis, mean-variance model, business data analysis and portfolio management, etc.

notes: 全英語授課 / 科研243教室

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容(限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用R語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮K棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理…等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授XQ程式交易軟體，撰寫XS程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識心理與教育測驗的起源、發展、運用與測驗實施及倫理議題，同時探討常模與標準化、信度、效度、測驗研發編製(含項目分析)的理論基礎。
description.en: To realize origin, development, application, test implementation and ethical issues of psychological and educational test and explore theories of norms, standardization, reliability, validity and test development (including item analysis)

description.zh: 校務研究（Institutional Research，以下簡稱IR）可說是針對校務所進行的各項研究，透過資料蒐集、分析、報告，以及教職員行動，以促進高等教育機構的運作與決定。同時IR的發展和大學評鑑的發展脈絡息息相關，最終的目的就是要提升學校辦學品質，促進學校良善發展。本課程主要希望加強同學對IR的了解及發展實作能力。
description.en: Institutional research is a broad category of work done at schools, colleges and universities to inform campus decision-making and planning in areas such as admissions, financial aid, curriculum, enrollment management, staffing, student life, finance, facilities, athletics, and alumni relations. Its mission is to foster a culture of evidence by facilitating the management, analysis, and reporting of institutional data and information in support of planning and decision-making. This curriculum is expected to provide all students understand the theory and practice of IR.

notes: 碩博課程 全英文授課

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

notes: 碩博課程 日夜合開

description.zh: 課程旨在介紹實驗影像的關鍵理論，說明導演與藝術家是如何使用視覺與聲音技術向影像本質提問，以啟動視覺之外感官知覺，進而擴展影像的語言。從早期歐洲前衛電影、城市電影、實驗影像，到台灣近年電影，關切在觀看裡的感官知覺經驗，以回應當代視覺文化裡，數位藝術、新媒體與沈浸式影像創作等的興起。
description.en: The course aims to introduce the key theories of experimental images. Filmmakers and artists employ audio-visual techniques to investigate the nature of images itself, intending to explore sensual perception beyond visuality and expanding the realm of images. Beginning from the early European avant-garde cinema, city symphonies, experimental images to recent Taiwanese films, this course focuses on sensory perception in spectatorship, in response to the emergence of digital art, new media, immersive images, and so on.

description.zh: 陶藝造型是一門以實作為主，實務講述為輔的陶藝設計創作課程。透過實務教學進行，提供學生陶瓷工藝廣泛多元視角的文化創新課程。課程旨在結合陶藝造型能力與陶瓷設計產出思維，從介紹陶藝發展、材料種類、技法使用，到進入實作，並導入工藝生活的精神。學生系統性的完成作品後，將透過展演形式發表成果。
description.en: The Ceramics modeling is a clay creation course supplemented by theory and practice. Through practical teaching, it provides a cultural innovation viewpoint with a wide range of perspectives on the ceramics craftsmanship. The course aims to combine the forming skills of ceramic art with the design thinking, from the ceramic art development, material knowledge, to techniques, and the introducing of the idea of craft in life. After the students have systematically completed the work, they will orginize a group exhibition to show the result.

notes: 人數上限15人；共同科館9樓陶藝教室上課

description.zh: 介紹各種車輛使用先進駕駛輔助系統(Advanced Driver Assistance Systems, ADAS)、自駕車及車聯網設備的感測器及其應用。自駕車及車聯網亦需要多種感測器之支援，皆需要對應的感測器系統。同時也介紹先進工業儀器設備的感測器及其連結網路，包含運動控制相關感測器、視覺相關感測器、力量相關感測器與製程監控相關感測器四大主軸。
description.en: This course introduces the sensors used in Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS), autonomous vehicle and car-interconnected devices. These systems need the corresponding sensors in the real implementation. The sensors used in the industrial instruments, for motion, vision, force detection and process monitor, are also included in this course.

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)，內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力。亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This course is an advanced course for financial accounting. It is to teach the financial accounting theory, concept, method and procedure for students with some basic accounting knowledge. The course covers all the materials to understand financial accounting based on IFRS. The course will help students for preparing advanced license examinations for accounting.

description.zh: 金融科技包含兩個字，金融與科技，是近年來新興的產業趨勢，影響的層面非常廣泛，不只是金融方面，更牽涉到新興科技與物聯網。本課程將從不同的角度分析金融科技的技術內容、應用領域及商業模式，並藉智慧財產權與國內外重要公司發展的得失做一介紹，希望達到了解並運用此新興科技的目的。
description.en: FinTech includes two words: Finance and Technology. It is a new trend of industrial field. It has influence on lot of technical fields, not only finance, but also emerging technologies and IoT. This course will analyze FinTech from different angles, such as technology contents, application fields and business models. It also will utilize intellectual property and experience of FinTech leading companies to obtain decent knowledge of this new field.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業(工業)相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之套特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1.The Characters of business laws. 2.The presentment of civil code. 3.The business registration laws and business laws. 4.The insurance laws.

description.zh: 區塊鏈由比特幣為代表的1.0，經過以太坊的智能合約為代表的2.0，進入以設計超級帳本或結合物聯網、人工智慧的3.0階段。在各產業的應用也逐漸廣泛，已呈現多元研究及發展的面向，也代表產業型態將因為區塊鏈的發展而發生重大的變革。本課程在帶領學生了解區塊鏈的核心技術、特性，以及目前在各產業的應用實例，並透過從發行數字貨幣到撰寫智能合約的商業應用，看見區塊鏈未來的發展。
description.en: Blockchain is represented by Bitcoin 1.0, and after 2.0 represented by Ethereum's smart contracts, it enters the 3.0 stage of designing a super ledger or combining the IoT and AI. The application in various industries is gradually becoming more and more extensive, and it has presented a multi-faceted research and development orientation. It also represents that the industry type will undergo major changes due to the development of the blockchain.This course leads students to understand the core technology and characteristics of blockchain, as well as current application examples in various industries, and sees the future development of blockchain through the commercial application from issuing digital currency to writing smart contracts.

notes: 資財三甲乙合開 / 科研240教室

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程主要是在於介紹一些駭客常用的攻擊方法和可能使用工具，並藉由這些技術的解說讓學生瞭解實際駭客的攻擊行為與思維模式，進而習得如何保護所管理的網路或資訊系統免於被攻擊成功。課程中將輔以實機操作，教導您如何利用現有電腦資源掃描及測試系統的安全問題，藉以保護系統安全，課程中將加強實際的上機操作，藉由上課所模擬的網路環境中，讓同學能夠實際感受攻擊的可能實況
description.en: This course is mainly to introduce network and system attack methods and security assessment tools used by hackers, and to explain the attack behavior and thinking strategy of hackers through the explanation of these technologies. In addition, this course teaches students learn how to protect the managed network or information system to against from being compromised successfully. The course will be supplemented by practices, and teaching students how to use the existing tools to scan and test the security of the system. In order to protect the security of the system, the course will focus on the system and network practices, which can let the students feel the possible network and system attacks.

notes: 資財三四甲、 碩合開 / 科研240教室

description.zh: 人類在從事數學演算、推理交談、觀察等各類動作時，均展現出 "智慧" 的現象。人工智慧即是利用電腦結合基本理論在有限度的範圍內從事上述各項工作，其中涵蓋了－自然語言了解、機器人學、電腦視覺、類神經網路、專家系統、自動化定理證明等，而本課程則主要在於提供必要之基礎，主要內容包括：1.搜尋法則，2.敘述邏輯，.Proving，4.Rule-Based Production，5.計畫產生系統，5.結構式物件代表：Semantic Nets，Matching，Frames，6.機器學習。
description.en: 1.Searching methods2.Description logic3.Proving 4.Rule-based production 5.Project generation system6.Semantic nets,Matching ,Frames7.Machine learning

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

notes: 電子大四甲乙合開；綜科502

description.zh: 先修課程：3001053或負責教授同意。Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、等效於連續函數的數位濾波器設計、使用轉換技術設計數位控制系統、使用狀態空間設計數位控制系統、電腦控制。
description.en: Z-Transform, Sampled-Data Systems, Discrete Equivalents to Continuous Transfer Functions: The Digital Filter, Design of Digital Control Systems Using Transform Techniques, Design of Digital Control Systems Using State-Space Methods, Application and Practice of Digital Control, Case Study.

description.zh: 3D列印（英語：3D printing），又稱加法製造、積層製造（Additive Manufacturing，AM），可指任何列印三維物體的過程。3D列印主要是一個不斷添加的過程，在電腦控制下層疊原材料。3D列印的內容可以來源於三維模型或其他電子資料，其列印出的三維物體可以擁有任何形狀和幾何特徵。本課程將介紹其原理及配合實機操作，使學生能對3D列印技術有正確的認識。(本課程鼓勵學生參加經濟部iPas的3D列印工程師考試)
description.en: 3D printing, also known as additive manufacturing (AM), refers to processes used to create a three-dimensional object in which successive layers of material are formed under computer control to create an object. Objects can be of almost any shape or geometry and are produced using digital model data from a 3D model or another electronic data. This course will introduce the principle knowledge of 3D printing and giving the opportunity to practice the use of 3D Printing.

name.en: The theory and practice of 3D Printing

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學相當課程或負責教授同意。 數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，布林代數與卡諾圖，組合邏輯電路設計與應用，多工器與解多工器，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to digital circuits, digital systems and coding, basic logic operations, Boolean algebra and Karnaugh-map, combinational logic circuit design and applications, multiplexer and demultiplexer, flip-flop, register, sequential logic circuit design and applications, counter and timer, shift register and memory, introduction to micro-processor.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個BIM相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM程式撰寫，BIM系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹1.變分法        2.線性彈性力學       3.變分法應用到彈性力學4.Euler梁與Timoshenko梁      5.扭力    6.古典板理論7.彈性穩定.
description.en: This course will introduces:1.Calculus of Variations2.Linear Elasticity3.Variational Principles of Elasticity4.Euler Beam and Timoshenko Beam5.Torsion6.Classical Theory of Plates7.Elastic Stability

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001017或負責教授同意。運動方程式、一維振動（自由及強制）、振動量測、二維振動、多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced),Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002013或負責教授同意。簡易連桿組之合成（圖解法與解析法）、耦曲線在設計上之應用、同耦曲線族、機構之靜力與動力分析、轉子之平衡、機構之平衡、飛輪設計、引擎動力學與平衡、凸輪動力學、臨界轉速、球面與空間連桿組之簡介。
description.en: Synthesis of Four-bar linkage (Graphical and Analytical Method) , Application of Coupler careers in Design , coupler cognate Mechanisms static and dynamic analysis of Mechanisms. Balancing Rotating Masses, Flywheels, Balancing Reciprocating Masses, dynamics of Cams, critical Whirling speeds, Introduction of spherical and spatial linkages.

description.zh: 介紹各種奈米結構材料：奈米碳管、奈米線、量子點、量子線和奈米複合材料的基本特性以及製備與應用技術，期能對奈米材料的物性、製造與應用有整體的認識。
description.en: This course will deal with the chemical and physical properties of nanomaterials. It will cover the preparation, structure, properties and applications of quantum dots and lines, carbon nanotubes, and nanocomposites.

description.zh: 本課程乃針對材料工程中金屬材料領域開立之專業課程。本課程藉由熱力學，電化學，物理冶金等基礎課程，依各類不同金屬材料的冶鍊與合金製作過程進行介紹。課程內容包括鋼鐵合金之冶鍊，非鐵材料包括銅、鋁、鈦、鎳、鎂、鋅、矽及貴金屬等材質之火法或濕法冶鍊製程，以上金屬合金之配置特性與特殊製程設備，以及各類合金特性與應用之領域。
description.en: The course is designated for undergraduate students who are interested in developing skills in metallic materials-related fields. Based on the concepts of thermodynamics, electrochemistry, and physical metallurgy, the course introduces the extraction metallurgy of metallic elements and their alloying processes. The course discusses: metallurgy of ferrous alloys, metallurgy and hydrometallurgy of Cu, Al, Ti, Ni, Mg, Zn, Si, and noble metals, and the specialty processes for preparing alloys of the above. Properties and applications of the above alloys are also covered.

description.zh: 電化學工程特論的領域眾多，舉凡腐蝕現象與電泳作用的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了介紹基本的電化學原理外，另將著重於電化學分析方法在能源與生醫系統研究上的應用。
description.en: Special topics in the field of electrochemistry include many different phenomena (e.g., corrosion and electrophoresis, electro analytical sensors and batteries devices, and the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine technologies……). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electro-analytical methods to the study of energy and biomedical systems.

description.zh: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 各種冷凍空調用熱交換器之介紹，熱交換器應用分析，熱交換增強簡介，鰭電分析，熱交換效率分析及熱交換器結垢問題分析。
description.en: Introduction to the heat exchangers used in HVAC & R, application of heat exchangers, heat exchange enhancement analysis, fin analysis, heat exchange efficiency analysis, and discussion on fouling of heat exchangers.

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何應用數值分析理論求解工程問題。包含數值方法基本觀念，數值方法之誤差及穩定性，非線性代數方程式之數值解法，聯立代數方程式之數值解法，矩陣特徵值求法，非線性聯立方程式之數值解法，多項式插值法及曲線嵌合，數值微分與積分，常微分方程式及偏微分方程式之數值解法 。
description.en: Introduction of using numerical methods to solve practical engineering problems. Topics include Solving nonlinear equations, Solving sets of equations, interpolation and curve fitting, numerical differentiation and integration, numerical solution of ODE and PDE.

notes: 車輛所、機電博、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 介紹電子、半導體、績體電路及數位技術的基本原理、及其應用。期使工業設計學生能具備21世紀微電子e世代產品新科技之基本知識。
description.en: A general introduce to the principle of Electronic technology, Semi-conductor, Integrated circuits, Digital technology, and their industrial applications. In order to equip design students with the basic knowledge of Micro-electronic with in the new Era.

description.zh: 本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。
description.en: As a parts and accessories to Architectural Design course, the goal of this seminar is to help students enhance their design proficiency superior to the excellent skill level of design. A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.

notes: 建築一與創意一合開（限主修建築系選課）

description.zh: 1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統--近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6) 7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)
description.en: 1.The tools 2.The basic optical systems 3.Basic optical devices 4.Seidel aberrations 5.Image evaluation 6.The design of optical systems 7.The use of Zemax 8.Project on optical design

notes: 電腦教室,光電三、四和光電所合開

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1.介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2.訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3.熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 排光華409,外碩,日碩,設計博合開(全英)

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於介紹數位遊戲發展理論以及數位遊戲創作美學理論，講解如何涵養遊戲美學與獲得數位遊戲媒材設計知識。上課內容包含數位遊戲發展、數位遊戲介面設計、數位遊戲表現模式、數位遊戲形式、以及數位遊戲趨勢以及實際設計小型Flash遊戲。教學方法包括：講解、討論、觀摩、以及示範操作。
description.en: This course is mainly an introduction to the theory of game media design and theory of digital game design aesthetics, showing students how to cultivate game aesthetics and acquire knowledge of digital game media design. Digital game development, digital game interface design, digital game presenting mode, digital game style, digital game trend, and small Flash game design will also be taught in class. This course will be carried out with lecture, discussion, emulation, and demonstration.

notes: 外生專班、互動所和設計博班合開,全英文授課

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: his course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三、建築四與職建都所合開

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程論述工業生產演進與全球綠色設計方法、趨勢，以及規範與法規需求，定義出創新、高品質和優秀的設計。引導學生多元領域學習，在建築設計中提出兼具環境、社會與經濟平衡之構想，藉以奠定我國未來勞動力市場的循環建築創新能量。
description.en: This course discusses the evolution of industrial production and global green design methods and trends, as well as the requirements of regulations and regulations, and defines innovation, high quality and excellent design. Guide students to study in multiple fields, and put forward the concept of environmental, social and economic balance in architectural design, so as to lay the energy of circular architectural innovation in China's future labor market.

notes: 建築三與職建都所合開

description.zh: 都市主義(Urbanism)最早可追溯於十九世紀末建築工程師對於空間組織與城市關係的討論，其真正的崛起始於二十世紀初對於集中生產，空間組織網絡與政治經濟市民等都市中新興現象的討論。因日趨複雜化的都市發展與環境巨變的挑戰，九十年代開始陸續出現一系列以都市主義為基盤的跨學科整合性討論，而景觀都市主義(Landscape Urbanism， 1997)則在其中扮演相當關鍵的角色。不論是庫哈斯早期在 ?S/M/L/XL ?中的批判或瓦爾德海姆在 ?都市景觀主義讀本 ?中的宣言，皆引指建築、景觀建築、都市設計與都市計畫學門，已逐漸形成一種彼此跨越亦彼此更新的領域狀態。這般 ?跨 ?都市主義架構，使各學門在理論發展與專業實踐上具有更開展性的方法，介入當代與未來的都市環境與城市生活。然而此跨都市主義的學理多在景觀學門的教學範疇內，但在建築專業教育中卻鮮有足夠的涉及與含括。本課程則基於此前提，欲將當代景觀都市主義學理，配合建築與都市主義思作為架構，一方面將景觀都市主義相關論述引入建築學習，另一方面欲擴充建築專業知識之本體，培養學生具有主體性的跨域知識建構。本課程結構以景觀與建築兩學門做為學理核心，同時為強化都市主義的實踐本質，將協同專家與景觀學人共同進
description.en: The term "urbanism" originated in the late nineteenth century with a focus onspatial organization of the city. The emergence of urbanism in the early twentieth century was associated with the rise of industrial distribution, spatial networks and citizenship etc. in the city. After 90’s, there were a series of new academic terms referring to this idea which created a base for interdisciplinary studies amongst related spatial terrains. Landscape Urbanism is regarded as one of the significant design and planning ethos especially in the twenty-first century. In Koolhaas’ early work S/M/L/XL and Waldheim’s representative collection The Landscape Urbanism Reader, they both shared account that architecture, landscape architecture, urban design and planning are moving toward shared form of ?emerging ‘practice. The body of knowledge about Landscape Urbanism has been largely developed within landscape discipline, yet merely in the architectural discourse especially in Taiwan.With such pr

description.zh: 自20世紀中葉以來，建築論證的核心及與其他學門之間的關係開始出現清楚的變化，而這些變動是具有證據性地邁向與文化研究和哲學領域的連結。如此關係並非單向性發展，而是一種建立在互惠性過程中的擴張擾動。不僅是建築師和建築理論家越發接近文化理論的觀念，相當多數的文化研究學者、哲學家和社會學家正逐步涉入建築和建築環境的議題甚而提問。在承襲如此能動的知識轉換脈絡下，卻也呈現出建築師和建築專業學生在面對理解甚至運用此些思想家的論述上， 遇見相當程度的艱難挑戰，從而導致學門之間非預期的距離與迷霧。基於此，本課程將由兩項核心意圖所構成。首先，承襲跨學門能動脈絡，試圖將建築引入更廣泛的文化背景，並思考文化理論辯證如何對於建築討論提供擴充性的訊息。其次，提供建築在文化研究論述中的閱讀錨定點; 一方面有助解碼文化研究專詞，另一方面為閱讀關鍵思想家的論述提供一條較清晰的認知途徑。本課程將以幾位重要文化研究學者與哲學家為核心，透過其本身直接書寫建築，或其關鍵性影響當代建築師與建築評論家的重要著作為課程內容架構，進而以更活潑豐富的路徑反思何為建築之內涵。
description.en: Since the mid-twentieth century, there is evidence of a strong shift in the center of debates within architecture and in its relationship with other academic disciplines, in particular with cultural studies and philosophy. It, however, was a reciprocal process. Not only are architects and architectural theorists becoming more close to ideas of cultural theory, but in great numbers of cultural theorists, philosophers and sociologists are to be found highly engaged with questions of architecture and the built environment. Yet, in recent, it is found that architects and students of architecture may confront struggling to deeply navigate those thinkers’ work resulting in unexpected distances and hazes between disciplines. Therefore, there are two intentions to form this module. Firstly, it attempts to introduce architecture to a broader cultural context, and to consider how debates from cultural theory might begin to inform a discussion about architecture (Leach 1997). Secondly, it tries

name.zh: 批判性建築與文化研究

notes: 建築四與建都所合開，全英授課

description.zh: 施工歷史可以被視為了解建築理論的關鍵基礎。按照慣例，建築學院提供建築歷史方面的研究方面，包括建築風格和哲學的發展，或者建築材料和建築技術的最新進展。此外，關於建築的理論辯論也更加關注哲學的討論，而不是物理建築的表現。 但是，建築理論主要討論材料和建築系統的表示。因此，材料的構造方法實際上會極大地影響建築理論的解釋。因此，該課程可以分為兩個部分：首先，將回顧東西方世界的建設歷史以及現代時期。其次，將討論結構論和相對論的爭論。本課程的目的是發展與會學生的能力，使他們能夠回顧自己論點的要點，並運用適當的理論來支持或爭論他們對建築理論的理解。
description.en: Construction history could be considered as the key foundation to understand architectonic theories. Conventionally, architectural academies provide study aspects either in architectural histories in terms of development of architectural style and philosophy or in the latest progress of architectural materials and construction techniques. Moreover, theoretical debates of architecture also pay more attentions to philosophical discussions instead of physical construction presentation. Nevertheless, architectonic theories mainly discuss the presentation of materials and construction systems. Therefore, construction methods of materials in fact affect the interpretation of architectonic theories significantly. As a result, this course can be divided into two sections: firstly the construction history of Eastern and Western worlds as well as modern period of time will be reviewed. Secondly the architectonic and relative theoretic debates will be discussed.

notes: 建築四、建都所與設計博合開，全英授課
