description.zh: 本課程分四年（八學期）教授， 四學年課程培養的核心專業能力如下: ■	第一年 : 以建築設計的基礎為範疇。訓練造型基礎，包括尺度、比例﹑秩序與韻律、實虛、量體與空間等造型的基本設計能力。                                                                                                                                        ■	第二年 ：以人與空間為範疇，並學習建築的內部構成要素。在具備設計基礎能力之後，進一步接觸建築的基本向度與原理的設計練習，包括身體與空間、使用行為模式、建築物理環境、構造與結構系統、建築構成系統、建築的類型與形態。  ■	第三年 ：都市建築為主要範疇。將建築的關注聚焦到與其連結的環境系統或城市紋理，學習從外部環境或都市理論回饋到建築的規劃設計。第四年：即畢業設計，培養學生針對特定建築問題之探究能力，鼓勵以建築思索如何關注社會、文化與自然的課題，最終以設計方案回應之。
description.en: This four-year course will be taught within eight semesters and aims to train students in the core competencies as follows:■ First year: foundations of architectural designTraining of fundamental modeling, including basic designing concepts such as scale, proportion, order and rhythm, solid and void, volume, and space■ Second year: people and space, and internal elements of architectureBeyond competency in elementary design, further practicing basic aspects and principles of architecture design, including human body and space, user behavior model, physical environment of buildings, construction and structure system, architectural composition system, architectural type and form, etc.■ Third year: Urban architectureFocus of environmental system or urban structure relating to architecture, which helps students apply what they have learned from the external environment or urban theory to the planning and design of buildings■ Fourth year: Graduation projectCultivating ca

notes: 建築一與創意一合開（限主修建築系選課）

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD.  From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems. This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

notes: 與高分所合開，因本課程含實作，人數限制20人

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems.This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

notes: 與分四合開 、因本課程含實作，人數限制20人

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標乃教導學生如何利用各種光譜分析方法以鑑定有機化合物之結構，包含紅外光譜、紫外線光譜、質譜儀、核磁共振光譜、X-射線光譜等。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce various spectroscopic methods to identify structure of organic compounds. It includes：UV spectroscopy, IR spectroscopy, NMR spectroscopy, Raman spectroscopy, Atomic  spectroscopy, Mass spectroscopy, X-ray methods, Potentiometric  methods, and Thermal methods.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 1.光纖感測介紹，2.光纖感測元件，3.光纖感測系統，4.光纖感測多工技術，5.光纖雷射感測系統，6.長距離光纖感測系統，7.大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8.光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

notes: 光電三和智慧感測合開

description.zh: 隨工業物聯網的快速發展，越來越多的感測數據得以被記錄，除了依賴專家的經驗判斷，更可藉由數據分析的結果提供決策上的輔助。本課程將介紹資料科學的基本分析架構，從問題定義、數據前處理、特徵工程、模型建立、結果解釋與評估等，除課堂講授資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: With the advanced technology in Industrial Internet of Things, amount of sensors are installed to collect data during manufacturing production and service process. In addition to rely on domain knowledge, we can also construct a data-driven model and extract useful information and rule for decision support and management.. This course will introduce analytics framework of data science including problem definition, data preprocessing, feature engineering, model construction, and result evaluation and interpretation. In addition to lecture, this course also training students how to analyze the data and problem solving through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 我們的事業甚至人生成功與否，不是建立在我們獲得與貢獻多少，而是在獲得與付出的過程中，我們是否樂在其中。能否在此過程中進行創意性思考，無疑是決定我們是否樂在其中的關鍵。本課程至少包括下述和「創意思考」相關的課題：它的神經科學基礎，它的心理學方法，它在哲學與邏輯上的認識論基礎，如何培養創意思考的基因，如何區別個人進行與在團體中運用創意思考，等等。本課程將進行系列的理論與個案探討，使學習者不僅知道什麼是「創意思考」，更要能夠進行創意思考。
description.en: Whether our careers and even our lives are successful or not is contingent not just upon the results we produce, but also upon whether we enjoy the activity of achieving those results.  To achieve this goal, we need to be able to think creatively.  The course hence covers at least the following topics relevant to “Creative Thinking”: its neuroscientific basis, its psychological methods, the epistemic foundation in both philosophy and logic, the development of the gene of creative thinking, the difference between thinking creatively as an individual and in a group, etc.  The course will proceed with a series of close studies of theories and practical cases, so that the participants of the course will not only know 'what is creative thinking', but also be able to think creatively.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 本課程介紹生產管理的角色，負責生產產品，為公司創造利潤。內容：生產基礎；生產規劃和排程；品質管制；生產庫存管理；財務績效評估；產能和制約理論。
description.en: This course introduces the strategic role of production management that is responsible for producing goods to generate profits for a company. Content: Production fundamentals; Planning and scheduling practices; Quality control; Production inventory management; Financial performance assessment; Capacity and constraints theories.

description.zh: 本課程分為三大重點：(1) 製程涵蓋：半導體基礎原理、晶圓製造、加熱製程、蝕刻製程、化學氣相沉積、金屬化製程、製程整合技術。(2) 分析涵蓋：晶相結構分析、奈米3D顯微形貌表面形態分析、原子力顯微鏡。(3) 業界講師共同授課並分享產業為來發展趨勢。
description.en: The course is divided into three main points: (1) The fabrication: basic principles of semiconductor, wafer manufacturing, heating process, etching process, chemical vapor deposition, metallization process, and process integration technology. (2) Analysis: crystal structure analysis, nano 3D micro-topography and surface morphology analysis, atomic force microscope. (3) Industry lecturers teach and share industry trends in the future.

name.zh: 半導體分子材料與製程檢測
name.en: Semiconductor molecular materials and fabrication testing

description.zh: 在諸多工程應用實例中，如LED、晶片之散熱問題、流體在能源系統中之熱交換、燃料電池衍生之熱問題等，都與材料之規格選用、處理方法、加工方式、製造過程有明顯的相關性。本門課程主要針對材料工程與熱管理相關的技術問題，提出探討與對策，期使學生對熱管理在材料與系統工程上的應用提供適當的專業知識。
description.en: In engineering applications, such as LED, chip cooling, heat exchange in energy systems, fuel cells, are always comes with the problems of thermal generation. Meanwhile, manufacturing process and heat treatment of these products are also strongly dependent of the selection of material specifications. The purpose of this course would like to employ practical problems and lead the students in finding appropriate solutions or technical approaches to solve the related problems they could meet.

name.zh: 材料特性與熱管理實務應用

notes: 限21人/全英語/機電所、機電博合開

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制3、電腦化的製造系統，如CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: 博士必修,碩士修不計畢業學分。老師行動不便請排1f教

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程在於了解數位組織概念以及數位轉型的趨勢，並且學習以科技為基礎之創新商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式如：數位轉型、共享經濟、金融科技、使用者生成內容等平台模式，並且連結到實務個案。
description.en: This course aims to understand concepts of digital organization and the trend of digital transformation via learning the technology-based business models. The innovative business models such as digital transformation, sharing economy, financial technology, user-generated content and etc. and those concepts will be linked to real-world cases.

description.zh: 本課程透過課堂演講，以講授最新管理知識或各產業之最新熱門管理議題，並透過學生分組研討使學生進一步瞭解經營管理的最新發展與趨勢。
description.en: This course focuses on lecturing, seminar, group study, and training of students' broad vision about the newly development and future trend of business management.

description.zh: 本課程除介紹土木工程的基本領域，如結構工程、大地工程、營建管理、生態與防災、水資源與水利工程、空間資訊、環境工程等外，亦強調環境生態、環境與人文等社會層面的議題，更著重於土木工程與環境的關係，期使未來在土木建設之際，亦能瞭解環境、尊重生態及朝永續利用的目標努力。另本課程亦強調訓練學生團隊合作、設計構想與動手實作能力，藉由課堂所學基本土木工程知識，利用簡易材料與設備再以電腦軟體輔助，自行構思、設計與製作土木結構或設備模型，及利用既有設備測試所設計之成品。
description.en: In this course, not only professional fields of civil engineering including structural engineering, geotechnical engineering, construction management, ecological engineering and disaster prevention, water resources and hydraulic engineering, and spatial information are introduced, but also environmental, ecological, societal, and cultural issues are emphasized. The most important point is focused on the relationship between civil engineering and environment such that students who take this course can understand environment, appreciate ecology, and pursue sustainable development when they are engaged in civil engineering construction in future. In addition, training of team works and ability to think, design, and carry out a plan by hand are emphasized. Students can plan, design, fabricate, and test a structural model using available material, equipment, and computer-aid software based on knowledge learned from fundamental civil engineering courses.

name.zh: 土木與環境暨基本實作
name.en: Civil Engineering,  Environment and Model Design

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

notes: *限40人/自備筆電，先修數位電路(需證明)/三年級合開

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 本課程以我國智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為教材，介紹電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查。
description.en: The textbook of this course is "Patent Examination Guidelines" which is issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office. We will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed in this course.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (III)

description.zh: 本課程將以近期著作權法著名案例的評析，培養學生關鍵的基礎能力，再導入若該著作為人工智慧自行創作或人類以人工智慧為輔具所創作之法律爭議，鼓勵學生從比較法考察及跨域科法整合之觀點，剖析立法、司法或行政所面臨的問題，並探求可能解決問題的具體措施或建議方案。
description.en: This course will analyze recent well-known copyright cases, expecting that relevant fundamental capability of students can be built.  Further, legal issues will be introduced in dealing with the copyright work created by AI itself, or created by human beings who are aided by AI.  Besides, efforts will be made to encourage students to analyze the problems encountered in legislative, judiciary, and administrative sectors, with considerations on comparative law and with viewpoints from integration of law and technology, and to propose concrete measures and suggestions that may help to solve the problems.

description.zh: 本課程將探討(1)智財商業模式與智財交易(2)英美契約法(3)智財授權契約規範(4)授權程序與稽核(5)技術合作契約(6)智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 學生們為研究必需習得的日文能力，此課程包含：(1) 日文閱讀與其文法(2) 紡織術語、複合材料、半導體、生物化學等日文(3) 最近科技研究開發之日文資料
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for advanced study. The course covers:(1) Japanese reading and its grammar(2) Textile terminology, composite, semiconductor, and biochemistry in Japanese. (3) Japanese references of the latest scientific and technological research and development

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一、二年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 基礎英文閱讀與字彙(一)
name.en: Basic English Reading and Vocabulary I

description.zh: 本課程以國內外新聞時事為教材，訓練學生從新聞的字彙入門，並藉由增加詞彙量與練習重要句型，使學生進而能閱讀與理解英文新聞。教材將選自報紙/雜誌（如China Post與Taipei Times雙語新聞）或線上新聞（如VOA Special English）中適合初級學生之各類新聞（如政治、經濟、科技、娛樂與時尚新聞等），以有效提升其基本英文閱聽能力。
description.en: This course aims to use latest and current news as teaching materials to help students build their vocabulary, familiarize themselves with basic sentence patterns and eventually develop their comprehension abilities. News reports suitable for basic-level students will be selected from newspapers or news magazines (e.g. bilingual news from China Post and Taipei Times) and online news websites (e.g. VOA Special English) to effectively enhance students’ fundamental reading skills.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調機電專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service Mechanical & Electrical Engineering students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

name.zh: 中級英文閱讀與字彙(一)
name.en: Intermediate English Reading and Vocabulary I

description.zh: 本課程旨在提升學生資訊領域的英語文能力，加強學生於該領域課堂學習與未來職業所需的閱讀與口說技巧。本課程中，學生將經由研讀資訊領域相關文章以及針對相關主題的討論，增加資訊領域的字彙，並加強英語能力與溝通技巧。
description.en: This course is designed for students who are interested in improving English skills in the field of information technology. It aims to increase students’ reading fluency and improve their speaking skills needed to function and succeed in classroom settings and in future career. In this course, authentic reading texts related to information technology will be used. description.en: Because many people play, watch, and discuss sports every day, being able to talk about sports and to understand sports idioms is very helpful when interacting with English speakers. The class helps students to understand more clearly English news about sports, to talk more thoughtfully with English speakers about sports, and to think more critically about the important role that sports play in the culture, language, and everyday life of people in the English-speaking world.

description.en: This course will be devoted to introducing the use of English in the field of economics, as well as discussing fundamental ideas and their applications and policy, so that students will be capable of considering important issues facing the society: the advantages of a free society, taxation and its interference with the market mechanism, and competition in international trade. Some of the important topics to be covered include Supply and Demand, Markets, Taxation, International Trade, and Income. The analysis of case studies and news excerpts will not only allow them to gain new perspectives and greater insights concerning issues; hopefully, they will also acquire the ability to use English in the discussion and presentation of relevant current issues.

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 中級英文閱讀與字彙(一)
name.en: Intermediate English Reading and Vocabulary I

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調人文專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service cultural business students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

description.zh: 本課程旨在帶領學生讀、理解並分析國際時事,提高學生之英文能力，透過對多元主體之解析，讓學生了解單字用法，句型結構，特殊術語和慣用俚語等，提升閱讀能力，另外配合聽力技巧學習，提升理解能力。本課程著重英文閱讀，聽力與口說能力，鼓勵學生以英文討論國際時事，發表見解，拓展對世界的認識。
description.en: This course intends to enhance students’ reading, speaking and listening abilities by using quality newspapers, journals, interviews and podcast. It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Students learn to read, discuss and debate global issues through diverse forms of activities. This course familiarizes students with world affairs and broadens their perspective of the world.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調設計專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與字彙(一)
name.en: Advanced English Reading and Vocabulary I

description.zh: 本課程培養學生職場必備的核心英文能力，主題包含英文履歷撰寫、商用英文書信、英文面試與簡報技巧、辦公室英文會話等。本課程同時加強學生基礎英文能力，如單字、文法、寫作等，並透過多元活動有系統性地發展英語溝通能力。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with the necessary English communication skills in the workplace. The content will include English resume writing, business English, English interviews, briefing skills, and office English conversation. This course will also strengthen students’ basic English skills, such as vocabulary, grammar, and writing.

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.
